All the wallpapers in this app are under common creative license and the credit goes to their respective owners. These images are not endorsed by any of the prospective owners , and the images are used simply for aesthetic purposes. No copyright infringement is intended, and any request to remove one of the images / logos / names will be honored . All the Images are obtained from pexels.com, pixabay.com as well as unsplash.com which are covered by the Creative Commons Zero license. That means all images are free for distribution and free for commercial use which also does not need any kind of attribution or credit.

Cool wallpapers are designed to fit your Android mobile devices. Imagine having cool video effects as background on your home screen. Decorate your home & lock screen with a different Wallpaper at the same time! The coolest 3D personalise moving Panorama wallpapers! Changes Mobile Screen Background Automatically. Make your phone screen look amazing with edge shining in multiple colors with slowly moving effects.

If you are having problems like wallpaper not Moving or removing itself, then follow below steps. \n-> Go to Recent Menu by clicking Menu Button from Phone\'s Navigation Buttons\n-> Tap and Hold on App\n-> click on Lock Button as shown below. \nNote: If this setting not available in your phone, then click for more detail and follow step 2 and step 3 pref_key_transition_time
